entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
